Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Classes that contain the game data and that notify the clients of their changes.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    DevMarket
    This interface helps implementing the decorator for the DevelopmentCardsMarket
    Market
    This interface helps to implement teh decorator for the resource market
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BoardProduction
    Represents the board production and generates an equivalent one with the chosen resources.

    DevelopmentBuilder
    This class follows the factory pattern and builds an instance of the development market

    DevelopmentCardDeck
    This class implements a deck of development cards

    DevelopmentCardsMarket
    This class implements the development cards market
    DevelopmentCardsMarketAbility
    This class is a decorator of the DevelopmentCardsMarket class, and considers any DiscountAbility if a player has one
